Penneo dokumentnøgle: BAWDF-7SQ1U-5DQE2-U45EP-KSJX6-AVFYT
Each work in progress is recognised in the balance sheet
in receivables or liabilities other than provisions
depending on the net value of the selling price less on
account invoicing and prepayments.
Costs in connection with sales work and contracting are
